attributes.action: introduce camera-based per-junction charging on congested motorway sections, using the revenue to convert the hard shoulder to a peak-time extra lane.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Starting with existing speed cameras in existing variable-speed sections of motorway, use cameras to implement cheap per-junction motorway congestion charging, with tolls payable by phone or at some petrol stations, and revenue used to convert hard shoulder to peak-time extra lane. Possibly extend to some toll roads, bridges, tunnels and dual carriageways, converting these to high efficiency lighting and implementing other general transport improvements.
